desc: This text is a basic introduction to the complex world of the Unix operating system. Here, you will find information about several aspects of working with Unix, from simple personal tasks to shell programming and system administration. Unix is a powerful and ever-evolving system, which is now available in variants designed for every hardware platform and with configurations to suit any preferences or needs. It powers much of the worldâ€™s academic and business information technology, and is increasingly popular for home networks and machines.
title: UNIX : Simply In Depth
